description: Normal Park Trails, a little up and down but nothing too extreme.  Good trail for a quick outing. A nice easy walk that is accessible in all seasons. The trails are mostly flat with a few small hills and wind through woods, meadows and marshes.
directions:
South on 272nd St., turn East on 8 Ave., turn South at Aldergrove Regional Park sign.
The main park entrance is on 8th Avenue just east of 272nd Street. There are several parking areas along the park entrance road, the largest is at the end of the road by the lake, washrooms and information kiosk.
title: Aldergrove Lake Regional Park
